Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20171172]HIV-1:inhibition of integrase catalytic activity(75% inhibition at 100nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits the catalytic activity of integrase and thus inhibits integration of viral cDNA.

Literature.Title: Mechanism of action of the HIV-1 integrase inhibitory peptide LEDGF 361-370.
Literature.Author: Hayouka Z, Levin A, Maes M, Hadas E, Shalev DE, Volsky DJ, Loyter A, Friedler A.
